title: Topic 001 Question 051
body: A SysOps administrator is examining the following AWS CloudFormation template:
/Amazon AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate Exam Practice Questions/img/0003100001.jpg
Why will the stack creation fail?
options: The Outputs section of the CloudFormation template was omitted.
The Parameters section of the CloudFormation template was omitted.
The PrivateDnsName cannot be set from a CloudFormation template.
The VPC was not specified in the CloudFormation template.
